newsitem.title: GERMANY: German unemployment shows small rise in August.
newsitem.headline: German unemployment shows small rise in August.

text.p: NUREMBERG, Germany, Sept 5 Reuter) - Unemployment remained high in Germany in August as the number of jobless rose 14,000 to 3.939 million on a seasonally adjusted basis, the Federal Labour Office said.
The unemployment rate, based on unadjusted data, was unchanged at 10.2 percent. The unadjusted number of unemployed was 3.902 million, down from 3.912 million in July.

In west Germany, seasonally adjusted unemployment rose 26,000 to 2.806 million, and the unemployment rate was unchanged at 9.0 percent. In east Germany the number of jobless fell 12,000 to 1.133 million. The unemployment rate was 15.0 percent, down from 15.4 percent.
